info.name: DEPRECATED - Flickr - (GM) - Commented ON - Small
info.description: DEPRECATED - IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ▶ Its for the Greasemonkey Script (GM), without others scripts which add other information near each thumb in thumbnail: by Alesa Dam: " Flickr Commented On (USO Mirror) "
info.additionalInfo: ▷ by Alesa Dam: " Flickr Commented On (USO Mirror) " (GM :Greasemonkey Script): "Shows whether or not you have commented on a photo. Adds a small icon to the menu bar on a flickr photo. The icon will be greyed out if you haven't posted a comment on the particular image - and will be coloured if you have! There is also a retrieving image, so you know when the thing is working." ▷ Discussion (Flickr Hacks) : Request: A fast way to know if I've already commented a particular picture (just like the favorite star but for comments) ► ► NEW How to fix this script, by carrmp == As of April 22 2015 [after Flickr's radical change] : BROKEN at this time... : "The following change to the script fixed this problem for me. Change the following on line 247 of function getUsername() from //a[ to //span[ The line should read : var buddyIcon = document.evaluate('.//span[contains(@class,"account")]/img[contains(@class,"gn-buddyicon")]', document, null, XPathResult.FIRST_ORDERED_NODE_TYPE, null).singleNodeValue; " ►► Firefox Addons and Greasemonkey Scripts (GM) for Flickr. Read here which Flickr Greasemonkey Script (GM) you can use : "My BIG List Of Scripts", in "Flickr Hacks". ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: These Styles are better with this Useful Addon/Script to preview thumbnail on hover: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus
